chapter.text: 37|1|shapath hai panktivadhd (farishton) kee
37|2|phir jhidakiyaan dene vaalon kee
37|3|phir smaran karake padhane vaalon[1] kee
37|4|nishchay tumhaara poojy, ek hee hai.
37|5|aakaashon tatha dharatee ka paalanahaar tatha jo kuchh unake madhy hai aur suryoday hone ke sthaanon ka rab.
37|6|hamane alankrt kiya hai sansaar (sameep) ke aakaash ko, taaron kee shobha se.
37|7|tatha raksha karane ke lie pratyek udhdat shaitaan se.
37|8|vah nahin sun sakate (jaakar) uchch sabha tak farishton kee baat tatha maare jaate hain, pratyek disha se.
37|9|raandane ke lie tatha unake lie sthaayee yaatana hai.
37|10|parantu, jo le ude kuchh, to peechha karatee hai usaka dahakatee jvaala.
37|11|to aap in (kaafiron) se prashn karen ki kya unhen paida karana adhik kathin hai ya jinhen[1] hamane paida kiya hai? hamane unhen[2] paida kiya hai, lesadaar mittee se.
37|12|balki aapane aashchary kiya (unake asveekaar par) tatha ve upahaas karate hain.
37|13|aur jab shiksha dee jaaye, to ve shiksha grahan nahin karate.
37|14|aur jab dekhate hain koee nishaanee, to upahaas karane lagate hain.
37|15|tatha kahate hen ki ye to maatr khula jaadoo hai.
37|16|(kahate hain ki) kya, jab ham mar jaayenge tatha mittee aur haddiyaan ho jaayenge, to ham nishchay punah jeevit kiye jaayenge
37|17|aur kya, hamaare pahale poorvaj bhee (jeevit kiye jaayenge)
37|18|aap kah den ki haan tatha tum apamaanit (bhee) hoge
37|19|vo to bas ek jhidakee hogee, phir sahasa ve dekh rahe honge.
37|20|tatha kahengeh haay hamaara vinaash! ye to badale (pralay) ka din hai.
37|21|yahee nirnay ka din hai, jise tum jhuthala rahe the.
37|22|(aadesh hoga ki) gher lao sab atyaachaariyon ko tatha unake saathiyon ko aur jisakee ve ibaadat (vandana) kar rahe the.
37|23|allaah ke siva. phir dikha do unhen narak kee raah.
37|24|aur unhen rok[1] lo. unase prashn kiya jaaye.
37|25|kya ho gaya hai tumhen ki ek-doosare kee sahaayata nahin karate
37|26|balki ve us din, sir jhukaaye khade honge.
37|27|aur ek-doosare ke sammukh hokar paraspar prashn karengeh
37|28|kahenge ki tum hamaare paas aaya karate the daayen[1] se.
37|29|ve[1] kahengeh balki tum svayan eemaan vaale na the.
37|30|tatha nahin tha hamaara tumapar koee adhikaar,[1] balki tum savany avagyaakaaree the.
37|31|to sidhd ho gaya hamapar hamaare paalanahaar ka kathan ki ham (yaatana) chakhane vaale hain.
37|32|to hamane tumhen kupath kar diya. ham to svayan kupath the.
37|33|phir ve sabhee, us din yaatana mein saajhee honge.
37|34|ham, isee prakaar, kiya karate hain aparaadhiyon ke saath.
37|35|ye vo hain ki jab kaha jaata tha unase ki koee poojy (vandaneey) nahin allaah ke atirikt, to ve abhimaan karate the.
37|36|tatha kah rahe theh kya ham tyaag dene vaale hain apane poojyon ko, ek unmat kavi ke kaaran
37|37|balki vah (nabee) sach laaye hain tatha pushti kee hai, sab rasoolon kee.
37|38|nishchay tum duhkhadaayee yaatana chakhane vaale ho.
37|39|tatha tum usaka pratikaar (badala) diye jaoge, jo tum kar rahe the.
37|40|parantu allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|41|yahee hain, jinake lie vidit jeevika hai.
37|42|pratyek prakaar ke phal tatha yahee aadaraneey honge.
37|43|sukh ke svargon mein.
37|44|aasanon par ek-doosare ke sammukh aseen honge.
37|45|phiraaye jaayenge inapar pyaale, pravaahit pey ke.
37|46|shvet aasvaat peene vaalon ke lie.
37|47|nahin hogee usamen shaaririk peeda, na ve usamen bahakenge.
37|48|tatha unake paas aankhe jhukaaye, (sati) badee aankhon vaalee (naariyaan) hongee.
37|49|vah chhupaaye hue andon ke maanind hongee.
37|50|vah ek-doosare se sammukh hokar prashn karenge.
37|51|to kahega ek kahane vaala unamen seh mera ek saathee tha.
37|52|jo kahata tha ki kya tum (pralay ka) vishvaas karane vaalon mein se ho
37|53|kya jab ham, mar jaayenge tatha mittee aur asthiyaan ho jaayenge, to kya hamen (karmon) ka pratiphal diya jaayega
37|54|vah kahegaah kya tum jhaankakar dekhane vaale ho
37|55|phir jhaankate hee use dekh lega, narak ke beech.
37|56|usase kahegaah allaah kee shapath! tum to mera vinaash kar dene ke sameep the.
37|57|aur yadi mere paalanahaar ka anugrah na hota, to main (narak ke) upasthiton mein hota.
37|58|phir vah kahegaah kya (ye sahee nahin hai ki) ham marane vaale nahin hain
37|59|sivaay apanee pratham maut ke aur na hamen yaatana dee jaayegee.
37|60|vaastav mein, yahee badee saphalata hai.
37|61|isee (jaisee saphalata) ke lie chaahiye ki karm karen, karm karane vaale.
37|62|kya ye aatithy uttam hai athava thohad ka vrksh
37|63|hamane use atyaachaariyon ke lie ek pareeksha banaaya hai.
37|64|vah ek vrksh hai, jo narak kee jad (tah) se nikalata hai.
37|65|usake guchchhe shaitaanon ke siron ke samaan hain.
37|66|to ve (narak vaasee) khaane vaale hain, usase. phir bharane vaale hain, usase apane pet.
37|67|phir unake lie usake oopar se khaulata garam paanee hai.
37|68|phir unhen pratyaagat hona hai, narak kee or.
37|69|vaastav mein, unhonne paaya apane poorvajon ko kupath.
37|70|phir ve unheen ke padchinhon par[1] daude chale ja rahe hain.
37|71|aur kupath ho chuke hain, inase poorv agale logon mein se adhiktar.
37|72|tatha ham bhej chuke hain unamen, sachet (saavadhaan) karane vaale.
37|73|to dekho ki kaisa raha saavadhaan kiye hue logon ka parinaam
37|74|hamaare shudhd bhakton ke siva.
37|75|tatha hamen pukaara nooh neh to ham kya hee achchhe praarthana sveekaar karane vaale hain.
37|76|aur hamane bacha liya use aur usake parijanon ko, ghor aapada se.
37|77|tatha kar diya hamane usakee santati ko, shesh[1] rah jaane vaalon mein se.
37|78|tatha shesh rakha hamane usakee saraahana tatha prashansa ko pichhalon mein.
37|79|salaam (suraksha)[1] hai nooh ke lie samast vishvavaasiyon mein.
37|80|isee prakaar, ham pratiphal pradaan karate hain sadaachaariyon ko.
37|81|vaastav mein, vah hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein se tha.
37|82|phir hamane jalamagan kar diya doosaron ko.
37|83|aur usake anuyaayiyon mein nishchay ibraaheem hai.
37|84|jab laaya vah apane paalanahaar ke paas svachchh dil.
37|85|jab kaha usane apane pita tatha apanee jaati seh tum kisakee ibaadat (vandana) kar rahe ho
37|86|kya apane banaaye hue poojyon ko allaah ke siva chaahate ho
37|87|to tumhaara kya vichaar hai, vishv ke paalanahaar ke vishay mein
37|88|phir usane dekha toron kee[1] or.
37|89|tatha unase kahaah main rogee hoon.
37|90|to use chhodakar chale gaye.
37|91|phir vah ja pahuncha, unake upaasyon (poojyon) kee or. kaha ki (ve prasaad) kyon nahin khaate
37|92|tumhen kya hua hai ki bolate nahin
37|93|phir pil pada unapar maarate hue, daayen haath se.
37|94|to ve aaye usakee or daudate hue.
37|95|ibraaheem ne kahaah kya tum ibaadat (vandana) karate ho usakee jise, pattharon se taraashte ho
37|96|jabaki allaah ne paida kiya hai tumhen tatha jo tum karate ho.
37|97|unhonne kahaah isake lie ek (agnishaala ka) nirmaan karo aur use jhonk do dahakatee agni mein.
37|98|to unhonne usake saath shadyantr racha, to hamane unheen ko neecha kar diya.
37|99|tatha usane kahaah main jaane vaala hoon apane paalanahaar kee[1] or. vah mujhe supath darshaayega.
37|100|he mere paalanahaar! pradaan kar mujhe, ek sadaachaaree (puneet) putr.
37|101|to hamane shubh soochana dee use, ek sahanasheel putr kee.

37|102|phir jab vah pahuncha usake saath chalane-phirane kee aayu ko, to ibraaheem ne kahaah he mere priy putr! main dekh raha hoon svapn mein ki main tujhe vadh kar raha hoon. ab, too bata ki tera kya vichaar hai? usane kahaah he pita! paalan karen, jisaka aadesh aapako diya ja raha hai. aap paayenge mujhe sahanasheelon mein se, yadi allaah kee ichchha hooee.
37|103|antatah, jab donon ne svayan ko arpit kar diya aur us (pita) ne use gira diya maathe ke bal.
37|104|tab hamane use aavaaz dee ki he ibraaheem
37|105|toone sach kar diya apana svapn. isee prakaar, ham pratiphal pradaan karate hain sadaachaariyon ko.
37|106|vaastav mein, ye khulee pareeksha thee.
37|107|aur hamane usake mukti-pratidaan ke roop mein, pradaan kar dee ek mahaan[1] balee.
37|108|tatha hamane shesh rakhee usakee shubh charcha pichhalon mein.
37|109|salaam hai ibreem par.
37|110|isee prakaar, ham pratiphal pradaan karate hain sadaachaariyon ko.
37|111|nishchay hee vah hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein se tha.
37|112|tatha hamane use shubhasoochana dee ishaaq nabee kee, jo sadaachaariyon mein[1] hoga.
37|113|tatha hamane barakat (vibhooti) avatarik kee usapar tatha ishaaq par aur un donon kee santati mein se koee sadaachaaree hai aur koee apane lie khula atyaachaaree.
37|114|tatha hamane upakaar kiya moosa aur haaroon par.
37|115|tatha mukt kiya donon ko aur unakee jaati ko, ghor vyagrata se.
37|116|tatha hamane sahaayata kee unakee, to vahee prabhaavashaalee ho gaye.
37|117|tatha hamane pradaan kee donon ko prakaashamay pustak (tauraat).
37|118|aur hamane darshaee donon ko seedhee dagar.
37|119|tatha shesh rakhee donon kee shubh charcha, pichhalon mein.
37|120|salaam hai moosa tatha haaroon par.
37|121|ham isee prakaar pratiphal pradaan karate hain, sadaachaariyon ko.
37|122|vastutah, ve donon hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein the.
37|123|tatha nishchay ilyaas, nabiyon mein se tha.
37|124|jab kaha usane apanee jaati seh kya tum darate nahin ho
37|125|kya tum baal ( naamak moorti) ko pukaarate ho? tatha tyaag rahe ho sarvottam utpattikarta ko
37|126|allaah hee tumhaara paalanahaar hai tatha tumhaare pratham poorvajon ka paalanahaar hai.
37|127|antatah, unhonne jhuthala diya use. to nishchay vahee (narak mein) upasthit honge.
37|128|kintu, allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|129|tatha shesh rakhee hamane usakee shubh charcha pichhalon mein.
37|130|salaam hai ilyaaseen[1] par.
37|131|vaastav mein, ham isee prakaar pratiphal pradaan karate hain, sadaachaariyon ko.
37|132|vastutah, vah hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein se tha.
37|133|tatha nishchay loot nabiyon mein se tha.
37|134|jab hamane mukt kiya use tatha usake sabaparijanon ko.
37|135|ek budhiya[1] ke siva, jo peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein thee.
37|136|phir hamane anyon ko tahas-nahas kar diya.
37|137|tatha tum[1] guzarate ho un (kee nirjeev bastiyon) par, praatah ke samay.
37|138|tatha raatri mein. to kya tum samajhate nahin ho
37|139|tatha nishchay yoonus nabiyon mein se tha.
37|140|jab vah bhaag[1] gaya bharee naav kee or.
37|141|phir naam nikaala gaya, to vah ho gaya phenke huon mein se.
37|142|to nigal liya use machhalee ne aur vah nindit tha.
37|143|to yadi na hota allaah kee pavitrata ka varnan karane vaalon mein.
37|144|to vah rah jaata usake udar mein us din tak, jab sab punah jeevit kiye[1] jaayenge.
37|145|to hamane phenk diya use khule maidaan mein aur vah rogee[1] tha.
37|146|aur uga diya us[1] par lataon ka ek vrksh.
37|147|tatha hamane use rasool banaakar bheja ek laakh, balki adhik kee or.
37|148|to ve eemaan laaye. phir hamane unhen sukh-suvidha pradaan kee ek samay[1] tak.
37|149|to (he nabee!) aap unase prashn karen ki kya aapake paalanahaar ke lie to putriyaan hon aur unake lie putr
37|150|athava kiya hamane paida kiya hai farishton ko naariyaan aur ve us samay upasthit[1] the
37|151|saavadhaan! vaastav mein, ve apane man se banaakar ye baat kah rahe hain.
37|152|ki allaah ne santaan banaee hai aur nishchay ye mithya bhaashee hain.
37|153|kya allaah ne praathamikta dee hai putriyon ko, putron par
37|154|tumhen kya ho gaya hai, tum kaisa nirnay de rahe ho
37|155|to kya tum shiksha grahan nahin karate
37|156|athava tumhaare paas koee pratyaksh pramaan hai
37|157|to apanee pustak lao, yadi tum satyavaadee ho
37|158|aur unhonne bana diya allaah tatha jinnon ke madhy, vansh-sambandh. jabaki jinn svayan jaanate hain ki ve allaah ke samaksh nishchay upasthit kiye[1] jaayenge.
37|159|allaah pavitr hai un gunon se, jinaka ve varnan kar rahe hain.
37|160|parantu, allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|161|to nishchay tum tatha tumhaare poojy.
37|162|tum sab kisee ek ko bhee kupath nahin kar sakate.
37|163|usake siva, jo narak mein jhonka jaane vaala hai.
37|164|aur nahin hai ham (farishton) mein se koee, parantu usaka ek niyamit sthaan hai.
37|165|tatha ham hee (aagyaapaalan ke lie) panktivadhd hain.
37|166|aur ham hee tasbeeh (pavitrata gaan) karane vaale hain.
37|167|tatha ve (mushrik) to kaha karate the kih
37|168|yadi hamaare paas koee smrti (pustak) hotee, jo pahale logon mein aaee
37|169|to ham avashy allaah ke shudhd bhakton mein ho jaate.
37|170|(phir jab aa gayee) to unhonne quraan ke saath kufr kar diya, atah, sheeghr hee unhen gyaan ho jaayega.
37|171|aur pahale hee hamaara vachan ho chuka hai apane bheje hue bhakton ke lie.
37|172|ki nishchay unheen kee sahaayata kee jaayegee.
37|173|tatha vaastav mein hamaaree sena hee prabhaavashaalee (vijayee) hone vaalee hai.
37|174|to aap munh pher len unase, kuchh samay tak.
37|175|tatha unhen dekhate rahen. ve bhee sheeghr hee dekh lenge.
37|176|to kya, ve hamaaree yaatana kee sheeghr maang kar rahe hain.
37|177|to jab vah utar aayegee unake maidaanon mein, to bura ho jaayega saavadhaan kiye huon ka savera.
37|178|aur aap munh pher len unase, kuchh samay tak.
37|179|tatha dekhate rahen, antatah ve (bhee) dekh lenge.
37|180|pavitr hai aapaka paalanahaar, gaurav ka svaamee, us baat se, jo ve bana rahe hain.
37|181|tatha salaam hai rasoolon par.
37|182|tatha sabhee prashansa, allaah, sarvalok ke paalanahaar ke lie hai.
